tool_description: Performs AC voltage calibration measurements across frequency and amplitude ranges, testing RMS accuracy and frequency response characteristics of the digital multimeter.

test_amplitudes.description: Test amplitudes as percentage of full scale

error_messages: Frequency out of range: Test frequency exceeds AC source or DUT capabilities.
Amplitude out of range: Test amplitude exceeds safe operating limits for DUT.
Insufficient frequency points: Minimum 3 frequency points required for adequate testing.
AC source instability: Reference AC source amplitude or frequency is unstable.
DUT frequency response poor: Significant frequency-dependent errors detected.
RMS measurement error: AC RMS readings show excessive error compared to true RMS reference.
Too many test combinations: Reduce number of ranges, frequencies, or amplitudes to manageable level.
usage: Define AC voltage ranges, test frequencies, and amplitude points. Tool generates calibrated AC signals and measures DUT response to characterize AC measurement accuracy.

frequency_response_errors.description: Measurement errors at each frequency test point

amplitude_linearity_errors.description: Linearity errors at different amplitude levels

worst_case_error.description: Worst-case error across all test conditions

frequency_bandwidth.description: Effective frequency bandwidth with acceptable accuracy
